1.content:
Who wakes up to their Christmas surprise?

Billy- 10 year old boy

Chloe- 9 year old girl

Travis- 16 year old boy

Jeffrey- 42 year old man
1.title: Christmas Surprise

choices: A sixteen year old black girl
An eighteen year old red head
11.content:
Billy was not unlike other ten year old boys. He was mischievous and often likes to goof around.

He woke up on Christmas morning and thanked his mom and dad for his presents.

He got a fair amount of toys, video games and clothes.

“Sweetie?” His mom called “Your father and I have one more present to give you.”

Billy was intrigued thinking he had originally opened them all but his mom and dad presented him with a tiny box in Santa wrapping paper

“Enjoy son!” His father said with a wink,

Billy took his present onto the couch, opened up the box and was shocked. There was a tiny female in the box.

Billy dumped the lady into his hand and realized the tiny person was...
11.title: Billy’s Christmas

choices: Billy tries to teach Anna some tricks
111.content:
Billy couldn’t believe he was looking at a tiny girl in his hand. She was ten years old like him, she had bright blue eyes, long blonde hair and a pretty green dress. Billy thought she was gorgeous and couldn’t believe she was only about four inches tall.

“Wow! A tiny girl?” The blonde girl curled up into a ball clearly nervous

“That’s right Billy!” His dad said “Your mother and I wanted to really surprise you so we ordered you a shrinkee.”

“What’s a Shrinkee?” Billy asked

“Oh a shrinkee is a tiny human born with a special gene. They start their lives out normal sized but eventually they start to shrink and shrink until they become the perfect size for gifts.”

“Wow!” Billy said lightly rubbing the shrinkee girls head. “This is so cool!”

“Now be careful son,” his dad said “Keeping a Shrinkee is a big responsibility. Do you think you can handle it?”

“I do!” Billy exclaimed. He then turned his attention back to the tiny girl. “Hi, I’m Billy I’m your new owner, what’s your name?”

The girl still sitting in Billy’s palm looked up and said “my name... is Anna.”

“I like that name. It fits.” Billy said. “Mom? Dad? Can I take Anna to my room?”

“Of course you can sweetie” Billy’s mom said

“Yes!” Timmy holding Anna in his hand ran back to his bedroom and plopped on his bed still holding the ten year old blonde in his palm.

“Alright, first things first Anna” Billy said
111.title: A blonde girl his age

choices: Billy finds a new dress for her
1111.content:
Billy looked the tiny girl barely a couple inches tall and decided to undress her. Anna didn't protest but was a bit curious about this. Billy grabbed the back of her dress and began pulling it up. She went with it and slipped her arms out.

"What exactly is this for?" Anna asked.

"To get a good look at you." Billy said.

He continued to undress her until she was completely naked. Anna tried covering herself but was stopped by Billy. He messed with her a bit to her pleasure. He loved his Shrunkee and how adorable she is. He would take great care of her and she would be as happy as can be.
1111.title: Billy undresses Anna

1112.content:
"Are you hungry Anna ?" Asked Billy whose eyes were gleaming full of expectations.

The tiny blonde hair girl hesitated before replying:
"Not really, I had some biscuits just before coming here."

"Do you need to use the toilet right now ?
Can you still do it even though you're so small ?"
Billy wanting to know more about the lifestyle of a Shrinkee.

"I can't go to the toilet like before.
Everything is so big now.
My family has thrown me away because I'm now a Shrinkee." Replied Anna who started crying out loud.

Billy was startled by her reaction and tried to appease her but nothing worked.
Anna was letting out lots of tears.
The boy picked up tissues and gave it to her.
After some time passed, Anna was able to regain her calm.

"I'm sorry for soaking your hands.
Please don't abandon me." Said the tiny girl with her eyes still red after crying a lot.

"I won't abandon you, Anna.
I am now your owner so I'll be sure to take good care of you. Just trust me.
I'm a Big boy who can handle any responsibility. " replied Billy while using his finger to gently rub on her head.

"So how do I call you ?" said Anna who was getting used to the boy.

"Just call me either Billy or Owner.
Wait it's better to praise me as a Master.
Yep Master sounds better and more cool.
I'll treat you very well if you follow my orders.
Don't worry I'll even share some of my favorites if you do well." Said Billy with a confidant voice.

"If that's how it is then I guess it's a great honor to serve you now Master.
So what do you want to do now ?" Asked Anna who was now smiling and started giggling.

"I guess my first order should be ...
1112.title: Billy asks Anna some questions

12.content:
Chloe was a very nerdy 9 year old girl. She always very curious and peppy despite having trouble making friends.

She is very cute at her age with blonde hair and blue eyes. She always enjoyed playing with her dolls and wanted a new one for Christmas.

Her parents wanted this Christmas to be special for her so they decided to go online to the Shrink Site where Shrunken people are auctioned.

They searched for hours and finally decided who they should give to their nine year old princess.

It was Christmas morning, Chloe woke up in her Disney pajamas and ran downstairs to her mom and dad.

“Chloe darling” her mom said “We wanted to get you something extra special for Christmas”

Her dad holds out a small box. Chloe eagerly opens it and the young girls jaw drops as she realizes she’s looking at a five inch tall shrunken person who was...
12.title: Chloe gets a gift

124.content:
Holding the box in her lap, Chloe’s jaw dropped as she saw the tiny teenager inside of it.

“Oh, god...” The older girl groaned, before Chloe swooped and squashed her against her chest.

“Ooh, you got me a real life dolly!” She giggled, holding her tight. “Wh-wh-what’s her name?!”

“...whatever you want it to be, honey,” her dad just winked. Meanwhile the teen in her hands had something to say about the matter.

“Hey! I’m not just letting some kid decide my name for me!” She cried. “It’s Alana, so call me that!”

Chloe frowned at the little teenager in her hands.
124.title: A little bigger girlfriend

choices: “But why don’t you wanna be my girlfriend?”
“But that’s so sad! What was her name?”
1243.content:
“Girlfriends?” Alana frowned. “I can’t be your girlfriend! You’re like half my age!”

“Sure you can!” Chloe grinned, and squashed an enormous kiss against most of her body. “...right dad?”

“Your dolly your rules, sweetie.”her father just dismissed, and am overjoyed Chloe dashed out of the room holding tiny Alana to her chest.

She charged into her bedroom and onto her bed, crossing her legs around Alana.

“So, uh...” she giggled awkwardly at the shrunken redhead in her lap. “Girlfriends, huh?”

Alana just frowned up at the tween. “...look, do you honestly think this is okay? I’m a human being, not your pet!”

“You’re not my pet you’re my girlfriend!” Chloe cooed down at her.

“...yeah sure, you’re what? 10?”

“9...”

“Oof, that’s even worse. L-“

“How is that worse?!”

“...I was just about to say before you interrupted me!”

“Ohhhh! Sorry.”

“Look,” Alana groaned. “I dunno about here, but where I come from it’s illegal to date a kid. And the younger the kid, the more illegal it is! So I can’t-“

“Ohh, don’t worry about that!” Chloe interrupted again. “What’re they gonna do? Arrest you?”

“...yes?!”

“Wouldn’t they have to find you first?”

“Well I guess...?”

“And I’m not gonna tell anyone? Are you?”

“Ugh, that’s not the point!” Alana threw her arms up at Chloe. “I’m breaking the law by just sitting here with you, pretty much! Anything we do together is just... wrong!”

Chloe just looked down at the tiny girl in her lap. “...so does that mean you don’t wanna be girlfriends?”

Alana groaned. “I never really did, if I’m honest! Besides, I already had a girlfriend before your lovely dad took me away from her!”

Alana stopped raging for a moment to notice Chloe’s giant sniffling. Rubbing at her cheeks and spluttering loudly, she realised she probably shouldn’t piss off the giant.

“But...” Chloe spluttered,
1243.title: “...wanna be girlfriends?”

choices: A pair of 15 year old twin girls
14.content:
Jeffrey didn't have the most glamorous life. He lived in a trailer park with his trashy wife Jaime, and their 1 year old son Toby.

The trailer was disgusting and Jeffrey hated his job as a plumber, partially because he wasn't very good at it.

He was a scruffy looking guy with an alcohol problem living in a trailer park. He wasn't fat persay but he did have a beer gut from drinking so much alcohol.

It was Christmas in Jeffrey's Alabama home. His wife got him a cheap bottle of booze, he couldn't get his wife anything or for his kid which caused Jaime to get mad and storm off for a while like she normally does.

"Damn bitch. At least she got me this whiskey." Jeffrey unbuckled his pants, plopped down on his couch, turned on the TV and started drinking his whiskey but to his surprise he noticed there was a tiny Christmas present underneath their cheap tree. He scratched his head in confusion.

"How did I miss that one?" He picked it up and read it "To Jeffrey from Anonymous.... That's weird."

Jeffrey took off the tiny ribbon and popped open the box, he heard a tiny voice echo out of it, causing him to scream in surprise.

"Aaaaaaaaaaaah!" After the shock subsided, Jeffrey looked in the box and noticed that there was a tiny female inside.

This tiny female was...
14.title: Jeffrey gets an X-mas gift

choices: Sophie and Callie, 15 year old twins
15.title: Other

151.content:
Emily heads downstairs Christmas morning to see her family already down their opening presents. Emily sighs softly and just walks over, she's used to this at this point, with a family of four brothers and three sisters Emily was often forgotten. Not to say that her family didn't love her, it's more than there was too many people in the house to keep track of at times.

Emily is fourteen years old and is pretty shy, she often spends time by herself reading or watching movies. While Emily was a shy girl she did have a few friends who would try to help Emily out by getting her out of her comfort zone.

Emily sits on the couch and opens her presents. She opens them all happy with what she had got. Emily looks over to see her bothers and sisters smiling and plying with their presents.

"This is from your Dad and I." Emily's mother says handing her a box. "Merry Christmas sweetie."

Emily looks at it a little confused, this looks unlike her other presents she has gotten. Emily's heart skips a beat when she sees the tag accidentally hanging out, it's the company logo of the Shrinkee foundation. Emily smiles widely, she can not believe that she had gotten a Shrinkee for Christmas, she had asked her parents months ago and she was told that they would cost too much.

Emily lets out a little squee and tears into the present, she opens the lid to look inside to see what tiny she had gotten.
151.title: Emily's Christmas

1511.content:
Emily opens up the box and looks inside to see a twenty five year old woman curled up at the bottom of the box. Emily smiles widely down at the woman, she had to admit that she looked beautiful. long blonde hair and a curvy figure. Emily smiles and reaches in curling her fingers around the woman. Emily giggles a bit when she picks her up as she feels that she’s only about eight inches tall. The woman looks up at Emily with a whimper and covers her ears.

"What's wrong?" Emily asks.

The woman doesn't answer, she just flinches and palms her ears hard. Emily realises that the room must be too loud for her as her family is all talking over each other and some are yelling. Emily stands up and takes the tiny woman back to her bedroom.

"Sorry about the noise." Emily apologies and places the woman on her desk.

"It's okay." She whimpers.

Emily sits down on the chair in front of the tiny woman and smiles just marvelling at her new girl. The girl smiles and blushes a bit as the teen girl's eyes travel over her body.

"So I guess I'm your Shrinkee?" The woman smirks.

"I guess so. I'm Emily." She smiles and holds out her hand to introduce herself.

"Brittany." She smiles softly.

"Such a pretty name for such a pretty girl." Emily smiles.

"Thanks." Brittany giggles and blushes. "You're very pretty too,"

"Thanks Brittany." Emily coos. "You're so sweet,"

Emily leans in and kisses Brittany's tiny face, she blushes and lightly kisses back making Emily giggle and blush.

"Can I ask how old you are?" Brittany asks nervously.

"I'm fourteen," Emily says. "But I'm fifteen in January, how old are you?"

"I'm twenty five." Brittany says,

"Wow," Emily gasps. "I never thought I would get a older woman."

"Excuse me?" Brittany giggles.

"I didn't mean you are that old," Emily laughs. "I was meaning that you are older than me that's all, when I saw the Shrinkee box I thought I was going to get someone my age or a year older that's all, I'm sorry."

"It's fine," Brittany laughs a little. "I was only teasing. So what's your status for me?"

"Huh?" Emily asks.

"Status, what is it you want from me?" Brittany asks. "Every Shrinkee gets a status form their new owner, it can be anything from pet to girlfriend, toy or just nothing if you wanted."

"I don't want to just keep you as nothing," Emily says, "You are special to me."

"Thanks." Brittany blushes.

"So how do you know so much about Shrinkees?" Emily asks.

"isn't it obvious enough?" Brittany giggles pointing down at herself.

"That's not what I meant." Emily laughs. "I mean how do you know so much about the Shrinkee system?"

"I've been there for a couple of years," Brittany says. "I'ver over heard so many conversations and read some of the books the company leaves lying around."

"I'm so sorry," Emily says. "I f I makes you any better I know you'll be so much happier with me."

"Thanks, I'm sure I will be." Brittany smiles and blushes. "So what's your status for me?"

Emily sits back and takes a good long think. What status does she want to give Brittany?
1511.title: Emily's Brittany

154.content:
Sophie and Callie shared just about everything, from clothes to their social lives to their bedroom. Sometimes it was a bit of a drag, like whenever you needed privacy and your twin was just there, staring at you with the sole purpose of making it awkward, but on the whole the girls got along well.

Come Christmas time, the girls’ mother had arranged for a ‘very special’ present for them both.

“Since you’ve been so good this year,” she beamed. “Your father and I have chipped together, and got you this.”
154.title: Sophie and Callie, 15 year old twins

1543.content:
“We could only afford the one, I’m sorry,” the girls’ mother explained. “But I’m sure you can both be responsible and share her, right?”

The lid came off the box, revealing a
1543.title: “But you’ll have to share her.”

info.brief_description: Someone wakes up on Christmas morning and receives a shrunken person
info.description:
Someone wakes up on Christmas morning and receives a shrunken person (3 to 6 inches tall)

RULES

No male on male interaction
Characters cannot grow or shrink more
Males characters can be no younger than 8
Female characters can be no younger than 9
